name: @omostan/angularjs-custom-multiselect
description: AngularJS multiselect dropdown directive originally developed by Stephen Long for his blog. Due to the fact that I have made several changes to the directive and my recent decision to move to the new Angular 8, I have decided to move this custom version of the original to npm repository.
author: Stanley Omoregie
credits: All credits to Stephen Long for devoloping the original version of this directive.
